availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Tisdale (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of George Tisdale and Jane Tisdale. Married to Ann M. Tisdale. Father of Milton B. Tisdale. School teacher in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860. Household owned two additional slaves in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 28B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Simpson, p. 22.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 298B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Subdistrict 150, p. 64A.
